description.narrative: By 2016, families of IDPs, returnees and host communities affected by emergencies and/or natural and man-made disasters have increased access to sustainable gender sensitive and environment friendly water supply and sanitation services and practice proper water, sanitation and hygiene behaviour and environment friendly water supply and sanitation services.
